This is a template

Keep in mind, this folder is not always required, but is commonly present

You include:
    - list of currently known problems
    - list of wanted features
    - instructions to submit a pull request
    - project information (funding, sponsors, company info, etc)
    - release notes (the changes made in a release program, EX: 1.4 terraria and 1.3 terraria)
    - github repository information (includes passwords/private info not for github)
